welcomeScreen.subtitle: We've rebuilt our app to make it easier to view the schedule, explore the city, and access need-to-know details!

gerdingTheater.title:
PORTLAND'S
GERDING THEATER
gerdingTheater.description: Join us in historic, diverse downtown Portland for this year’s Chain React Conference! We’ll kick off on July 11th with a hands-on, two-track workshop at the Benson Hotel, continuing at the Gerding Theater at the Armory on the 12th and 13th.

gettingToChainReact.subtitle: GETTING TO CHAIN REACT FROM PDX
gettingToChainReact.description1: The closest airport is Portland International Airport (PDX), a one-hour flight from San Francisco. From New York, PDX is more like a six or seven-hour flight. Think of all the email you can catch up on!
gettingToChainReact.description2: Upon arriving at PDX, take a taxi, Uber, or Lyft downtown. It's an easy 20-minute ride to The Benson Hotel where the conference kicks off. Once you’re at your hotel, grabbing a Lyft or Uber is a breeze, so there’s no need to rent a car. You’ll be exploring all the city has to offer in no time.

wifi.title: WIFI NETWORK
wifi.description: Git clone, Slack, and surf cat videos to your heart's content!

sponsors.title: THANKS TO THIS YEAR'S SPONSORS
sponsors.description: Support from our amazing sponsors make Chain React possible!
